original_title: Stefanik booed by protesters at memorial event in New York district | Fox News
article_summary: Rep. Elise Stefanik, R-N.Y., was booed offstage by protesters during an event in her home district, where she criticized "radical Far Left Democrat agitators" and honored a local political leader. Despite the disruptions, Stefanik returned to deliver her remarks, emphasizing the importance of commemorating the late John Zurlo's legacy.</s>
